meta.title: LCB Fertilizers' 5th Anniversary
meta.description:
Today, on 12th February 2025, we proudly celebrate another milestone in the journey of LCB Fertilizers. Since its inception, LCB Fertilizers has been dedicated to revolutionizing agriculture through innovative and sustainable solutions. 



Over the past year, we have made remarkable steps, formed impactful collaborations, and reached new heights in our commitment to empowering farmers across India.

headings: Today, on 12th February 2025, we proudly celebrate another milestone in the journey of LCB Fertilizers. Since its inception, LCB Fertilizers has been dedicated to revolutionizing agriculture through innovative and sustainable solutions.
Over the past year, we have made remarkable steps, formed impactful collaborations, and reached new heights in our commitment to empowering farmers across India.
Our Journey in 2024-2025: Milestones and Achievements
Krishika Expo 2024: Showcasing Innovation
We had the honour of participating in Krishika Expo 2024 , organised by Amar Ujala , in the presence of the Honourable Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh , Shri Yogi Adityanath ji .
Our CEO, Mr. Akshay Shrivastav , along with CMO Mukesh Singh Chauhan and COO Shubhendra Singh , presented Navykosh Organic Fertilizer , a product born from years of research.
They explained how Navykosh stands apart from conventional chemical fertilizers, providing crop-specific nutrients and reducing irrigation needs by 33% through its super absorbent polymer technology.
RuTAG Smart Village Centre, Almora, Uttarakhand

We are proud to be part of the second RuTAG Smart Village Centre in Almora , Uttarakhand . The initiative, led by the Principal Scientific Adviser to the Government of India , supports rural innovation and agricultural development.
LCB Fertilizers’ participation reflects our commitment to eco-friendly solutions that improve livelihoods, reduce irrigation demand, and promote sustainable farming practices.
New Organic Fertilizer Distribution Centre in Baghpur, Kanpur Dehat
A significant step towards accessibility, we inaugurated a new organic fertilizer distribution centre in collaboration with Krishi Mandi .
This centre provides high-quality organic and biofertilizers to farmers, ensuring environmental sustainability and improved soil health.
Recognition by the Gates Foundation India

LCB Fertilizers was honoured by the Gates Foundation India for its contributions to sustainable agriculture. Our flagship product, Navykosh, has transformed traditional farming by reducing water usage and increasing crop yields.
We are grateful for the recognition and remain dedicated to pioneering more agricultural advancements.
Inauguration of the Organic Fertilizer Production Unit at Batiya Garh, Damoh
On the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee , we proudly announced the inauguration the Organic Fertilizer Production Unit at Batiya Garh , Damoh .

This initiative, supported by the Madhya Pradesh Government and inaugurated by Honorable Shri Prahlad Singh Patel , Minister of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj , aims to promote natural conservation and cow protection.

This joint venture, in collaboration with Express-E-Connect Pvt. Ltd . and Akhil Bhartiya Panchayat Parishad , Madhya Pradesh , marks a significant step towards sustainable agriculture and rural development.
Expansion: New Production Units
Bundelkhand Production Unit, Mahoba – Launched on 13th April 2024, marking a significant milestone in our manufacturing expansion.

Sonipat, Haryana – Inaugurated with the support of IIT Kanpur’s RuTAG and the Principal Scientific Adviser to the Government of India . This state-of-the-art facility will enhance organic fertilizer production and distribution.
RSVC Collaborations: Empowering Rural Farmers

At RSVC, our goal is to bring sustainable agricultural solutions directly to farmers. Success stories from RSVC Mandaura and RSVC Indore highlight how our organic fertilizers have improved soil health, increased yield, and encouraged farmer-led initiatives.
In Mandaura , farmers witnessed significant improvements in soil quality and mustard crop growth, leading to a community-driven effort to establish an LCB Fertilizers plant.
Similarly, in Indore, experienced agronomists validated our product Navyakosh’s strength, leading to the establishment of another production unit.
With Team LCB Fertilizers, led by Akshay Shrivastav , we are now setting up fertilizer plants in multiple states, including Haryana , Madhya Pradesh , Chhattisgarh , Odisha , and Maharashtra .
Looking Ahead: A Commitment to Growth

As we celebrate this anniversary, we reaffirm our commitment to innovation, sustainability, and farmer empowerment. LCB Fertilizers will continue its mission to provide eco-friendly, high-yield solutions that transform Indian agriculture.
We extend our gratitude to our partners, stakeholders, and the farming community for their unwavering support. Together, we are paving the way for a greener, more prosperous future.
